name: Performance Gear
description: This is an e-commerce website for sports accessories, where customers can browse, purchase, and review various sports products, including gear and apparel. The website is fully responsive, offers user authentication, and allows users to manage products they add to the platform. It also features various animations, dark/light theme toggle, and sorting functionality.

details.detailedDescription: The primary challenge in Performance Gear was to implement the product sorting.
details.improvements: Future plans include integrating add customer review feature.

name: VitalMeds
description: VitalMeds is a feature-rich multi-vendor e-commerce platform designed for buying and selling medicines and healthcare products. Built using the MERN stack, the platform provides a seamless user experience, ensuring efficient management for admins, sellers, and users alike.

details.detailedDescription: The primary challenge in VitalMeds was to implement redirect the user to the dashboard base on their role.
details.improvements: Future plans include add more section and functionality to make this site most effective.

name: Learn Lang
description: Language Exchange simplifies the process of finding, reviewing, and booking tutors across diverse languages and subjects. This platform promotes global learning opportunities and streamlines the tutor hiring process, providing a seamless experience for both students and tutors.

details.detailedDescription: One of the main challenges was implementing to show category wise tutor.
details.improvements: Planned improvements include adding search functionality in Find tutor page
